item.description:
We will meet at Ellisville Harbor State Park at 9 AM. Then we plan to car pool to the Forest and begin our hike from Parking Lot 2. I suggest you park at Ellisville in the upper lot past the farm house rather then along 3A and your car will be there when we finish our hike.

The hike is 12 miles of the Wishbone Trail beginning in MSSF, passing through a Wildlands Trust property, a stop at Halfway Pond, on to Old Sandwich Road, then to the Beach. Bring snacks, water, a light lunch to enjoy on Halfway Pond while we dip our toes into the cool water. Don't forget to wear comfortable hiking shoes. See you Tuesday!

View info about the Wishbone Trail--Â maps & GPS waypoints on the Facebook page for the Plymouth Wishbone Walking Trail.

Sea Lions this spring at Ellisville Harbor- picture by Cj Dunn.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: March to the Sea "and make salt!"
